column1: Homicide data are extracted from the Homicide Survey database.  As a result of ongoing investigations in Port Coquitlam, BC there were 5 homicides reported in the Vancouver CMA total for 2007, 5 reported in 2004, 7 reported in 2003 and 15 included in 2002 that occurred in previous years.  Homicides are counted according to the year in which police file the report.
Statistics Canada. Table 252-0081 - Incident-based crime statistics, by detailed violations and police services, British Columbia, annual (number unless otherwise noted)
